ThingDef.Name: RB_SuperheroBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
When bees need to fight a supervillain, they don't call a bee that dresses as a bat and fights petty crime at night, because that would be absurd: they call the superhero bees, who fly around at supersonic speeds dressed in teeny tiny capes and blue pyjamas. They create honeycombs stuffed with Super-nanites, though they produce them exceedingly slowly.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 30 days
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants needed: Super-nanites
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC
